key_risks: Legal and patent disputes, including a $96.3 million jury award to Natera
Regulatory and reimbursement challenges, particularly with Medicare and commercial payers
Highly competitive and fragmented transplant diagnostics market
Data privacy and security concerns with expanding digital health solutions
controversies: Ongoing patent infringement lawsuits and potential prolonged legal battles
Reimbursement uncertainties and reliance on fluctuating reimbursement policies
social_issues: Data privacy and security risks associated with patient data management
governance_issues: Legal disputes and regulatory compliance challenges
